description.@en: I cut, sew and measure—all the while keeping an eye on who’s coming and going.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: When you fail a Charm or Eavesdrop Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome. In addition, you always succeed at Skill Tests to accurately estimate Distances.
